title: PL#6 Realistic Police LED Light Set and Light Bar for 1/8th & 1/10th Scale Cars and Trucks 7 Flashing Modes - Compatible with Traxxas, HPI, Redcat Racing, Team Associated, Tamiya
features: 7 different flashing modes (easily switched from one mode to another)
Flashing LED lights on front and back of bar for realistic look
Fits most 1/10th and 1/18th scale cars and trucks
Comes with 2 x 10mm White; 2 x 10mm Red; 4 x red/blue flashers in 5mm
Includes connector for a 9V transistor battery (battery not included), or it can be wired directly to the vehicle's battery
description: Let them know who is boss down at the track. This realistic police bar lighting kit is an awesome addition to any car or truck! Features: 7 different flashing modes (easily switched from one mode to another) Flashing LED lights on front and back of bar for realistic look Simple and easy to install Fits most 1/10th and 1/18th scale cars and trucks Specifications: Includes connector for a 9V transistor battery (battery not included), or it can be wired directly to the vehicle's battery Can handle from 3 volt D.C. up to 12 volt D.C. (more voltage = brighter lights)
